# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

Below is the Julia code for the problem statement:

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    result = ""
    line_length = 0

    for word in words
        if line_length + length(word) > text_width
            result *= "\n"
            line_length = 0
        elseif !isempty(result)
            result *= " "
            line_length += 1
        end
        result *= word
        line_length += length(word)
    end

    return result
end
```

Example:

```julia
print(wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines", 10))
```
